lectureCredit: Lecture credit based on a colloquium, from which you can receive XX points. To pass the subject it is necessary to obtain min. 50% points.
lectureExam: Lecture credit based on a written exam consisting of XX tasks.
project: Project class credit based on grades from XX projects performed during the semester.
laboratory: Laboratory credit based on points obtained for subsequent exercises (min. 50% points required).
computerClasses: Computer classes credit based on a colloquium, from which you can receive XX points. To pass the subject it is necessary to obtain min. 50% points.
seminar: Credit based on the presentation of the thesis topic (33% of the grade), presentation of the selected diploma question (33% of the grade) and development of the selected diploma question (34% of the grade).
classes: Classes credit based on two colloquia, it is required to obtain at least 50% from each colloquium.
